plays.text: Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Boyd Devereaux and Steve Duchesne
Penalty to Andreas Salomonsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Mathieu Dandenault
Goal scored by Jason Arnott assisted by Petr Sykora and Brian Rafalski
Goal scored by Andreas Salomonsson assisted by Jim McKenzie and Scott Gomez
Penalty to Petr Sykora 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Kris Draper
Penalty to Kris Draper 2 minutes for Holding Petr Sykora
Goal scored by Jay Pandolfo assisted by Jason Arnott
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Turner Stevenson
Goal scored by Jason Arnott assisted by Bobby Holik and Patrik Elias
Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Hooking Petr Sykora
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Kirk Maltby
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 5 minutes for Checking from Behind Kirk Maltby served by Randy McKay
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Slashing Sergei Brylin
Penalty to Sergei Brylin 2 minutes for High Sticking Chris Chelios
